participant_1.background:
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
my dog is the ring bearer.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
i am training to be a welder.
I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico.

participant_2.background:
I am single and live with my three cats.
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

content.text: Good! I just finished a painting. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to work on my vintage cars and go to the gym. How about you?
I love to create art. I'm also really proud of my work ethic, and I'm not superstitious at all, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.
I'm not superstitious either, but I do believe in fate. I'm a conservative politically, and I'm training to be a welder.
That's interesting! What made you want to become a welder?
I've always been fascinated by metalworking, and I think it's a really important skill to have.
I agree! I think it's a really cool career.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a musician. I play the piano, the guitar, and the bass. I also sing.
That's awesome! I love music. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Nice! I like rock music too. Do you have any shows coming up?
Not right now, but I'm working on a new album.
That's great! I'll be sure to check it out.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's out.
